Group hierarchy: To cut costs, I assume I will charge users to stream videos in 720p. If 10% of daily sessions stream in 720p and I stream the rest in 480p, I will be able to reduce my CloudFront data transfer from 73 TB to 27 TB. I also decided to keep only the current year's worth of data in S3. This reduced S3 Standard storage by approximately 20 TB.
